zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，谨慎观望]
zh.content:
当前，雪崩币（AVAX）在13.1462美元附近震荡整理。由于24小时变化仅为0.16%，市场情绪相对平稳，短期内缺乏明确的方向。高点13.2397美元和低点13.0646美元形成了一个区间，该区间内的波动可能为交易者提供短线操作的机会，但需谨慎把握。

从技术指标来看，SMA(20)为13.55362，显示出价格尚未突破该均线，表明短期趋势仍处于弱势。MACD值为-0.27649091，显示出市场可能仍然面临卖压，而RSI指标尚未提供，进一步分析需关注价格与技术指标的变化，尤其是RSI的后续表现。

支撑位方面，13.0646美元是近期低点，若价格跌破该水平，可能引发进一步的下行压力。阻力位在13.2397美元，突破该点位则可能引发多头反弹。交易者在操作时应密切关注这些关键价位，以便及时调整策略。

建议投资者在当前市场环境下保持谨慎，选择高质量的入场时机。若价格能有效突破阻力位，可能考虑适量布局；反之，若跌破支撑位，则应果断止损，减少风险暴露。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar stands at 13.1462, showing a slight uptick of 0.16% over the past 24 hours. This modest increase suggests a consolidation phase, as the asset trades between the recent high of 13.2397 and the low of 13.0646. The overall trend appears to be bearish given the recent price actions, and traders should be cautious as the market seeks to establish a clearer direction.

The absence of a calculated RSI leaves room for interpretation, but the MACD indicates a negative momentum at -0.27649091, suggesting that sellers remain in control. The SMA(20) at 13.55362 further reinforces the bearish sentiment, as the price is currently below this moving average. A sustained close below the SMA could trigger further downside, while a move above this level may signal a potential reversal.

Key support levels can be identified around the recent low of 13.0646, which may provide a cushion for buyers if the price declines further. Conversely, resistance is noted at 13.2397, where upward momentum may falter. A break above this resistance could open the door to revisit higher levels, while a breach below the support could indicate deeper retracements and increased selling pressure.

For traders considering a position in AVAX/USD, a cautious approach is warranted. Short-term traders might look for opportunities to sell on rallies towards the resistance level, while long-term investors may want to wait for confirmation of a trend reversal before entering. Monitoring the price action around these key levels will be crucial to make informed decisions in this fluctuating market.
